mean_en: to give a lot of your time and effort to a particular activity or purpose because you think it is important; to say at the beginning of a book, a piece of music or a performance that you are doing it for somebody, as a way of thanking them or showing respect; to hold an official ceremony to say that a building or an object has a special purpose or is special to the memory of a particular person
sentence: I dedicate this award to all of my fans.
sentence_trans: 我把这个奖献给我所有的粉丝。
word_etyma: de加强 + dic说 + ate使，造成 → 再说 → 努力献身
